title: Destruction Decoded
overview: Exploring life-altering, earth-shattering events through archive footage, CGI, and informative scripting. Delves into the science behind each event, shedding light on fascinating elements and providing an understanding of their occurrence.Created by Big Media. Available Languages: English, French, Spanish. Sold to over 25 countries worldwide. "Broadcast" on many global, national/regional services: subscription, TV Linked & Free.
